attributes.additional_details: This is in regards to the boxing match Amir King Khan vs Lamont Peterson, which King Khan dismissed as 'Discusting'. We therefore call on the boxing world to look onto what really happened in the fight and take further action. Who was the mystery guy in the hat  sitting right next to the judges. Strong evidence shows that the mystery man tells the judge what to do and at one point picks up the yellow card. Was King Khan robbed of his fight remains the executive question in the boxing world.
